Description: Finish: Gun Metal Blue, with nickel black hardware.Body: Alder Neck: Maple, 3-ply. "Thin U" neck profile. Neck-thru-body construction Scale: 25.5" - Standard.Fretboard: Ebony, with Dot inlays. Scalloped from the 12th to the 27 fretFrets: 27, XJ (Jumbo) Nut: FR Locking, 42 mm Headstock: ESP MH-style Bindings: White (neck and headstock) Tuners: Original Gotoh.Bridge: Original Floyd Rose tremolo Pickups: 1x Seymour Duncan '59 (SHR-1n) (neck) railcoil & 1x Seymour Duncan Custom 5 (TB-14) (Bridge) humbucker Electronics: 1x volume, 1x tone (with a push-push tap switch for single coil-like tones and a total of 6 different sounds), 3-way blade switchThe guitar comes in a high-quality original ESP Horizon Series form fit hard case with ESP logo. 2013 ESP HORIZON 27 STANDARD SERIES GUN METAL BLUEUSED IN LIKE NEW CONDITION. CUSTOM COLOR.THIS GUITAR WAS PAINTED BY ESP FOR ME. I ORDERED HER IN 2012 AND RECEIVED HER IN 2013.THIS IS NOT A RE FINISH. IT WAS A SPECIAL REQUEST THAT I PAID FOR. EVERYTHING IS ORIGINAL.THERE ARE NO CHIPS, DINGS, DENTS OR SCRATCHES. SHE IS A GEM. CLEAN AND BEAUTIFUL. I AM SELLING A LOT OF MY GUITAR COLLECTION. THERE WILL BE MORE TO COME.KEPT IN THE CASE IN A SMOKE FREE HOME.COMES IN ORIGINAL CASE WITH FLOYD ROSE BAR AND TOOLS. USA SHIPPING ONLY.
Title: ESP-HORIZON FR-27 STANDARD SERIES GUN METAL BLUE
